Video (1 of 3) : One To Many Client Lead Gen Without Using The Phone

July 1, 2014 By andywhitehead

The problem. You use the phone to make one to one calls with clients and candidates. You are burnt out, frustrated, tired and know something needs to change. The tools ans methods of recruiting you have been taught are to make more calls, work harder and do have a word with yourself. Get on with it. The weak get eaten.

 

The truth is. You have been sold a lie. The Recruitment model is broken. In this first of three videos I open you to new possibilities including how to have 1 million messages sent out endorsing your recruitment agency from the experts in your niche, how to plan your month to make NO cold calls.

Let’s dive in……

10 Minute Free Power Session

Schedule a free 10 minute power session with Andy to see if these strategies can be applied in your business.

  1.    Get crystal clear about what’s possible for you – (money, status & freedom)
  2.    Discover the # things that’s stopping you – from getting what you want.
  3.    3-Step action plan – and identify the most powerful actions to double your monthly income.
  4.    Leave confident, excited & reinspired – to take your business to the next level…fast.

Schedule your call by clicking on Access Now.
